sections.heading: Administration
sections.text: by sheriff or county license department.

sections.heading: Deposit
sections.text: of fees in county general fund by sheriff.

sections.heading: County
sections.text:
auditor to cause licenses to be printed; delivery to county treasurer for

signature.

sections.heading: Delivery
sections.text:
of licenses to sheriff; cancellation of unsold licenses; statement of

settlements made by sheriff.

sections.heading: Sheriff
sections.text:
to pay money collected to county treasurer; liability of sheriff for money

uncollected.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text: for sheriff or employee of county license department to issue other licenses.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text: issuance, possession or circulation of business license; penalty.

sections.heading: Unlawful
sections.text:
to collect money without delivering license or to insert name of more than one

person or firm in license; exception.

sections.heading: Regulations
sections.text: for collection and enforcement of taxes.

sections.heading: Statement
sections.text:
required in ordinance imposing or increasing tax or fee; contents of agenda

proposing ordinance; notice of proposal to change another tax or fee to tax or

fee measured by income or revenue.

sections.heading: Exclusion
sections.text:
of certain gross revenue; recordkeeping; limitation on period covered by audit;

procedure for review of audit.

sections.heading: Audits:
sections.text: Rights of and notices to proprietor of enterprise.
